name: Dog Daze Deluxe
description:
Dog Daze Deluxe is a 2-player arcade game for the 8-bit Atari computer.

A version of Dog Daze with improved graphics and sound. Two dogs appear n the screen, each controlled by a different player. Fire hydrants appear on the screen, and the first player to reach the hydrant makes it that color. Immediately a new hydrant then appears on the screen. If a target is not tagged fast enough, a car will drive across the screen, and if his a dog, it's game over. On the top of the screen is a counter, and for every successfully tagged hydrant, it moves towards that player. The first person to take control of the counter is the winner. If the player runs into a hydrant previously tagged by an opponent, they also lose a point, until the screen is almost filled by tagged hydrants. Each player can throw a bone, and if hits an untagged hydrant, the player gains the point. If the bone misses, it needs to be collected before it can be thrown again.
